description: This Kotlin source file defines the HomeFragment class, which manages the UI displaying a list of restaurants in the food delivery app. It sets up a RecyclerView, populates it with mock data, and handles navigation to a restaurant's menu when an item is selected.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays a list of restaurants using RecyclerView and handles user interaction to navigate to restaurant menus.

methods.name: onAttach
methods.description: Initializes the adapter and sets up click handling when fragment is attached to context.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout from XML resource.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Configures the RecyclerView, assigns layout manager and adapter, and populates the list with mock data.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of HomeFragment.
